### import raw TR data 

```{r wd librairies}

library(ggplot2)
library(car)
library(ggpubr)
library(segmented)
library(pastecs)
library(dplyr)
library(patchwork)
library(RLRsim)
library(lme4)
library(inti)

here::here()

opPATH.obj= "./saved_objects/"
  if (!dir.exists(opPATH.obj)) dir.create(opPATH.obj, recursive = TRUE)


opPATH.results= "./results/"
  if (!dir.exists(opPATH.results)) dir.create(opPATH.results, recursive = TRUE)


opPATH.data= "./data/"
  if (!dir.exists(opPATH.data)) dir.create(opPATH.data, recursive = TRUE)


opPATH.fig= "./figures/"
  if (!dir.exists(opPATH.fig)) dir.create(opPATH.fig, recursive = TRUE)
```

```{r import data }
data <- read.csv(here::here(opPATH.data, "DATA_ROOT_TRAITS_LTP_2025.csv"), dec = ".", sep = ";")
panel <- read.csv(here::here(opPATH.data, "panel_pearl_millet.csv"), dec = ".", sep = ";")

data$PHENOTYPED = as.factor(data$PHENOTYPED)
# select only 4 rep , ie Phenotyped during week 1 or 2, but not both 1&2
data = data %>% filter(PHENOTYPED %in% c("1", "2"))
unique(data$PHENOTYPED)


data$N_GENO=as.factor(data$N_GENO)
data$REPETITION=as.factor(data$REPETITION) 
data$BLOCK=as.factor(data$BLOCK)
data$BLOCK_WEEK=as.factor(data$BLOCK_WEEK) 
data$WEEK=as.factor(data$WEEK)

data$GENO_TRT= paste(data$N_GENO, data$REPETITION, sep = "_")
data$GENO_TRT=as.factor(data$GENO_TRT)


data$LEAF_AREA=as.numeric(data$LEAF_AREA)
data$ROOT_SHOOT=as.numeric(data$ROOT_SHOOT)


nlevels(data$N_GENO)
nlevels(data$REPETITION)
nlevels(data$BLOCK)


save_before_cleaning = data

data=na.omit(data)


trial="LTP_PM_2025"
trait_name = "ROOT_SHOOT"

```

```{r sorting outliers}
## sup outliers need to be removed (impossible values)
count_before = nrow(data)
 data.RmOut <- data 



    out <- boxplot(data.RmOut$ROOT_SHOOT, plot = FALSE)$out # values to remove
    tf <- which(data.RmOut$ROOT_SHOOT %in% out) # position in the list
 data.RmOut$ROOT_SHOOT[tf] <- NA
    


    data.RmOut = na.omit(data.RmOut)
    count_after = nrow(data.RmOut)

out_tot = count_before - count_after
    
paste0("still ", nrow(data.RmOut), " observations on ",  nlevels(data.RmOut$N_GENO), " genotypes ", out_tot, " outliers removed")


```

```{r histogram }


# save after cleaning
data = data.RmOut

#Clean  data (remove NAs)
ROOT_SHOOT_values <- na.omit(data$ROOT_SHOOT)
df <- data.frame(ROOT_SHOOT = ROOT_SHOOT_values)
mean_ROOT_SHOOT <- mean(ROOT_SHOOT_values)
sd_ROOT_SHOOT <- sd(ROOT_SHOOT_values)

#Create histogram with normal curve using ggplot2
p <- ggplot(df, aes(x = ROOT_SHOOT)) +
  geom_histogram(aes(y = ..density..), bins = 30, fill = "lightblue", color = "black") +
  stat_function(fun = dnorm, args = list(mean = mean_ROOT_SHOOT, sd = sd_ROOT_SHOOT), color = "darkred", size = 1.2) +
  labs(
    title =  paste("Histogram of", trait_name, trial ),
    x = trait_name,
    y = "Density"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()



# Save the plot
ggsave(
  filename = paste0(opPATH.fig, "HIST_", trait_name, "_" ,trial,".png"),
  plot = p,
  width = 6,
  height = 4
)


print(p)
```

```{r anova among block rep}
model<-lm(ROOT_SHOOT~REPETITION, data = data)
aov<-Anova(model)
print(aov)


model<-lm(ROOT_SHOOT~BLOCK, data = data)
aov<-Anova(model)
print(aov)

model<-lm(ROOT_SHOOT~BLOCK_WEEK, data = data)
aov<-aov(model)
print(aov)


model<-lm(ROOT_SHOOT~WEEK, data = data)
aov<-Anova(model)
print(aov)
```

```{r anova geno }
library(lme4)
# week the main source of variation here
model_geno<- lmer(ROOT_SHOOT ~ 1 + (1 | N_GENO) + (1 | WEEK) , data = data)
print(model_geno)
```


```{r anova without }
model_reduced <- lmer( ROOT_SHOOT ~ 1 + (1 | WEEK),  data = data)
print(model_reduced)

```


```{r comparison }
anova(model_reduced, model_geno)

```

```{r heritability }
library("inti")
library(lme4)

hr <- H2cal(data = data,
            trait = "ROOT_SHOOT",
            gen.name = "N_GENO",
            rep.n = 4,
            fixed.model = "0 + N_GENO + (1 | WEEK)",
            random.model = " 1 + (1 | N_GENO) +  (1 | WEEK) ",
            plot_diag = TRUE,
            outliers.rm = TRUE)


last_plot <- recordPlot()

df_output = as.data.frame(t(hr$tabsmr))

knitr::kable(df_output, caption = paste0("Summary heritability estimates ", trait_name, " ", trial))
 
```







```{r heritability output}

replayPlot(last_plot)
dev.off()
```
